Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to participation in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations by members of the state police; repealer
Summary: Includes members of the state police who drove or rode in vehicles used in cleanup operations within the definition of participation in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations.
LawCode: Amd §363-bb, rpld §363-bb sub h ¶1 sub¶ (d), R & SS L; amd §161, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to participation in World Trade Center rescue, recovery or cleanup operations by members of the state police; and to repeal certain provisions of the retirement and social security law relating thereto
